actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States for the protection of unborn children and other persons.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Defines "person" to include the unborn for the purpose of the right to life guarantee. Makes such amendment inapplicable when continuation of the pregnancy will cause the death of the mother.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States for the protection of unborn children and other persons.
